attributes.action: Change classic car road tax exemption to the age of car not the date of 1973
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently cars have to have been constructed before a set date - the 1st January 1973 to be eligible for historic car tax exemption. We the undersigned would like the date to be changed to age of cars to say 30 years, it has been fixed for a number of years. A number of cars which were built in British factories are becoming few and far between and would like the Government to help preserve these cars by offering and extension on the current exemption date.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/CarTax1973/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
